scenario_text.value: Kaito, enough of this.

I am not going to let you destroy this world.
For your own good as much as anything else.
Are you crazy?! How is that for my own good?!

You want to save this world? Don’t make me
laugh. You just don’t want to die!

Yeah, you’re right. I don’t want to die, and
I don’t you to kill anyone either.

We all got drawn into this world out of the
blue, and we’ve been through a lot.

But we got through it together. Even now
I think of you as my friend, Kaito.

We’re not friends!!! I’m going to destroy you
all, along with everything else!

But we are friends. And I’ve got your back,
no matter what.

Are you really that stupid?! I attacked you!
I tried to kill you!

But before that, you looked out for us as
your friends.

That... That was just because Miu was with
you.

No. I’m talking about what you did for us,
not what you did for Miu.
You helped us out all the time.

You tried to stay cool, kept an eye on our
surroundings, and considered our next moves.

You and Dracmon fought together to help keep
us safe!

You were a friend we knew we could rely on,
which is why we wanted you to rely on us!
What...?

After you lost Miu, when you were hurting...
No, not even just then.

You could’ve counted on us for anything, no
matter how small it was.

Kaito, let’s stop this. Nothing is going to
bring Miu back.
But you’re not alone, Kaito.
You’re such an idiot.
Kaito...!
It’s too late for any of that!

I sacrificed Dracmon to gain the power
I needed for revenge!
But...
It’s too late now! I can’t turn back!!!
